query.statement:
SELECT '' FLAG,LIFNR ,(SELECT NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS M WHERE M.MANDT = P.MANDT AND M.LIFNR = P.LIFNR) AS NAME1 ,(SELECT J_1KFREPRE FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS M WHERE M.MANDT = P.MANDT AND M.LIFNR = P.LIFNR) AS J_1KFREPRE ,PSPID ,(SELECT P2.NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0002 AS P2 WHERE P2.MANDT = P.MANDT AND P2.TEMNO = P.TEMNO FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS NAMET ,CASE WHEN PSPID = '00000Z' THEN '사무실보관' ELSE (SELECT ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 WHERE MANDT = P.MANDT AND POSID = PSPID) END AS ZSITE_NM ,SEQ ,CASE WHEN PSPID = '00000Z' THEN IPQTY-INQTY-BANQTY+OUTQTY+LOSQTY ELSE IPQTY END AS IPQTY ,INQTY ,OUTQTY ,LOSQTY ,BANQTY ,CASE WHEN PSPID = '00000Z' THEN IPQTY ELSE IPQTY-OUTQTY-LOSQTY END AS CURQTY ,GUBUN ,ZZACTSS ,SUBSTR(CDATE,1,4)||'.'||SUBSTR(CDATE,5,2)||'.'||SUBSTR(CDATE,7,2) AS CDATE ,CHAR(ROWNUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY MANDT)) AS ROWNUM FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW0111 AS P WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LIFNR = #LIFNR# AND GUBUN = 'A' ORDER BY SEQ,PSPID
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
